SummaryEnglish: From superstar creator Grant Morrison, comes 18 Days, is a re-imagining of the great eastern myth, The Mahabharata, and follows the course of the climactic war that concludes the age of the gods and begins the age of man. It is the prototype for every war ever fought. The scale is epic, wherein the biggest armies ever conceived face one another across the ultimate battlefield to decide the fate of the future.

1.SummaryEnglish: What is the history of the world of 18 Days? Find out the secret of the four ages as told to us by the cyber-sage Markandeya.

2.SummaryEnglish: Markandeya's tale of the four ages raises many questions for the Pandavas and only the enigmatic Lord Krishna has the answers they seek...

3.SummaryEnglish: After 13 years of exile in the forest the Five Pandava brothers return to claim back their kingdom from their cousin and King of Hastinapura - Duryodhana.

4.SummaryEnglish: Bhima loses his temper and charges to attack King Duryodhana but will the immortal Bheeshma allow that...?

5.TitleEnglish: I Will Bathe In Your Blood
5.SummaryEnglish: After Bheeshma swats away mighty Bhima like an insect a challenge is laid to Duryodhana. But will the scheming King accept?

6.SummaryEnglish: The two armies have taken to the battlefield and face each other. Pandava Vs. Kaurava. The battle at the crack of the ages has begun.
